CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: CG High Explosive Anti-Tank
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Shape charge explosive capable to penetrate armored target.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: CG Area Defense Munition
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Flechette round for close range defense.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: 40mm Flechette
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Flechette round for close range defense.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: 40mm Foam Grenade
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Non-Lethal Foam Round, capable to extinghish fire.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: 66mm Incendiary
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Incendiary round to scorch an area with flames.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Panzerfaust HEAT
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Mass produced Shape Charge Anti-Tank Warhead, excellent counter armored target.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Panzerfaust Frag
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Modified warhead, filled with metal fragments and shrapnels.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: 25x59mm HEAB
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Tactical anti-personnel explosive munition capable detonate in midair, causing airburst effect fragment damage to an enemy.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: 25x59mm HEDP
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Explosive munition capable of penetrating armor while also do fragmentation damage.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: 25x59mm HEI
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Explosive munition with both fragmentation and incendiary damage.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: 25x59mm HE-EMP
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Explosive munition with both fragmentation and electromagnetic pulse damage.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: 88mm RPzB HEAT
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Mass produced Shape Charge Anti-Tank Rocket, excellent counter armored target, only work with direct hit since it doesn't has enough fragmentation effects for area damage.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: 88mm RPzB Frag(ID)
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Modified Shape Charge Anti-Personnel Rocket, excellent counter soft target, not designed for direct hit since the fragment covers are on the side of the warhead.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: 8cm Raketen Sprgr(HE-ID)
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Modified High Explosive Rocket, Good counter light/medium armored target, not designed for direct hit since its purpose is cover an large area with explosive.
